turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Like mother, like son....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: My mother always told me, if God had intended us to ride parachutes for fun, we'd have been born with free tickets....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: It sure is good to be home....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It sure is....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: She calls it, 'Tourist On The Loose.' Local government commissioned it. For the public beach....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: We forgot to stop at the store.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Make a list.

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: We need milk....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Big unveiling ceremony in a couple of weeks....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: We need beer....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'll be right there.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I miss him, Matt.  I still can't believe he's gone.

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Tell Matt he should be here....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: It doesn't take much to remember what day they come....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: My brain is shrinking.  There's only so much room.

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Don't give me that preoccupied scientist crap.  I'm trying to get ready for....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I thought artists worked with their subconscious....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: How come it's my responsibility?

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Because....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I take out the garbage, because...I'm glad we got that straightened out....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: We don't have anything straightened out.  You're uptight about something ...what's wrong?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Why should there be anything wrong? I'm sitting around the house, enjoying my day off and you start yelling at me about garbage....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What the hell are we arguing about?

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: I don't know...You...I don't know.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: No fair, I'm not armed.

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Then don't come any closer.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Turn it off....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Off....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: I have work....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I've always wanted to make love to an angry welder.  I've dreamed of nothing else since I was a small boy.

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Close the door.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: They're at the beach....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Where have you been...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What's wrong?  What happened?

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Thea was attacked by a shark....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: The doctor said she should be all right...She's in shock....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: But it went away...We would have known....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: You knew...?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It went away....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Sweetheart....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: She could have been killed...You knew and you didn't tell us...You let your mother think....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Where is she?

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: How could you do that?  Your own daughter....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Where's my mother?

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: I don't know....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Why didn't you tell us?  Why didn't you tell us?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm sorry.  Please, Carla.  I didn't think there was any danger.  I'm sorry. I love you.  Both of you.

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: No cooking while you're here...No washing dishes...No cleaning....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm not on vacation....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: It'll grow on you.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I like it.  Really....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: I could use a half-dozen more arms ...I've only got two weeks to get this thing finished....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Do you and Michael ever talk about his work...?  About spending so much time working in the water?

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Usually it's all he talks about...You mustn't worry....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I can't help it....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: I used to worry...But you know what happens, you find out that scuba diving's safer than climbing into the bathtub....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I shouldn't interfere...  My mother-in-law is so neat she puts paper under the cuckoo clock....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Henny Youngman....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You caught me....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: You're not interfering, Ellen....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: You want to try your hand at something...?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'd be afraid of losing....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: At least he doesn't have a beard....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Do you enjoy dealing blackjack?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: All he did was kiss me....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: It's beginning....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Beginning of what?

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Whatever happens next.....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I always thought when I grew up I'd know what to do about things like this...I don't even know if he's serious....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Give it some time, Ellen...See what happens.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Part of me wanted to go off with him, the rest of me couldn't...I don't know why he wants me....

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: Maybe he's got good taste...I don't think he's spent much time with a woman like you....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I don't know what he thinks...I don't know what I think...I don't even know why I'm talking about it...  It's silly...I'm getting too old for this sort of thing....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: We will...We'll have a lot of time together.  What are you going to do now?

turns.speaker: CARLA
turns.text: We'll be there....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You make sure they come?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Michael!  This thing working?

turns.speaker: CLARENCE
turns.text: You rigged it...You spent all that money on an education and you come back looking like this....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Michael!

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: We have three months of work and approximately no money left to support it....

turns.speaker: CLARENCE
turns.text: Spent it all on beer....

turns.speaker: CLARENCE
turns.text: Sweet breezes...Sweet women....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: You have something to say about everything....

turns.speaker: CLARENCE
turns.text: What the hell's it doing in warm water anyway...?

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: What difference does it make?  It's here....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: Get the bang sticks.  We're going down.

turns.speaker: CLARENCE
turns.text: Bang sticks are like yelling at it....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: We're going down.  All of us....

turns.speaker: CLARENCE
turns.text: They won't kill it....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: We'll divert it...We'll do something....

turns.speaker: CLARENCE
turns.text: I hope the man knows what he's doing....

turns.speaker: JAKE
turns.text: He knows what he has to do....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Stop that....

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: Stop what?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: That....

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: I'm not doing anything.

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: That hurt....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Serves you right.  Will you please stop....

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: Can't help myself....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I see what you're doing....

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: I'm hungry, Mom....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Let me finish dinner before you eat it...Chop the peppers....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Are you all right?

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: Adds flavor....

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: We don't want any....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Hello?  Thea who?  I know it's Thea Brody.  How many grandchildren do I have?  I know you can use the phone by yourself. You're a big girl.  I know you're five.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: The fish.  Check it....

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: You check it....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm on the phone....

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: Ask the big doctor about his work.  Tough life you Bahamian beach bum... Playing in the water all day....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: He heard that.

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: Good.

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: A big one....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: A small one...Your brother won't be here....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Don't be late.

turns.speaker: SEAN
turns.text: I won't....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: In a minute....

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: What's going on?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Yes!

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: You can stay in my room.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'd like that.  I need to be away from here.

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: Can I ride one sometime...?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: It's too dangerous....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I never....

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: Where's the lady who brings the soda?

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: I like Grandma's cooking....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Thank you....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: No, no...It's too dangerous....

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: Mommy lets me....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Your father was six then.  Just like you....

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: I'm still five....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: We have to dig it deep so the water will go all the way around...So we can swim to it....

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: You're silly....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You're coming, aren't you...?

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: Who's coming?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: No one.  Nothing.  We've got to get this finished before the tide comes in.

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: It's not nice to be evasive.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: What's it cost to take a ride on that plane...?

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: The water's coming in...The water's coming in....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I almost forgot....

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: I didn't.

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: I put everything in my room.  My Teddy bear is joining us.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Thanks for the consultation....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'll be in to read you a story.

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: Good night, Daddy....

turns.speaker: THEA
turns.text: I will.  I'll miss you, Grandma.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'll miss you....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: It came for him.  It waited all this time and it came for him....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Mother....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Sit down, Ma....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You guys must be starving....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I want you to get out of the water....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: What?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I want you to give up that terrible job.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Come on, Mom, you can't be serious....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You're damn right I'm serious....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm just getting started....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I don't want you in the water anymore....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Mom, you're upset.  Sit down...Please....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I won't have anyone in my family any- where near the water....  Never again...Never....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Hey, come on, you can't believe that voodoo.  Sharks don't commit murder. They don't pick out a person....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: It picked Sean...It killed your father....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Dad died from a heart attack....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: He died from fear...From having to go out there after it....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: There's never been a great white where we live.  It's warm water... They don't like it....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Your brother's dead...Your father's dead....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Oh, it looks like my uncle's.  He taught me how to sail when I was a kid....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It's Jake's actually...Our floating lab....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Oh, I didn't mean....  I'm being such a Grandma....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Come on, I'll show you around.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I didn't mean to start that....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Don't be such a Grandma...I was always climbing something....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You were a monkey....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: All you all right?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm fine....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: How are you doing?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: We haven't had a real talk, have we? We'll do that before I go.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'll be all right, Michael.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Good.  So will I....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Nothing out of the ordinary....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Once he locked himself in the bathroom and your grandfather had to get the ladder and climb in through the window....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I want you to give up your work....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Mom, please don't start that again....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You could teach...You could....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm not going to quit now....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You're all I have left...I don't want you going in the water....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You're having a good time....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I am.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I enjoy his company....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I don't like him chasing around after you...I don't trust him....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: He's not chasing and I'm not running. And that's ridiculous....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm not going to bother you anymore about your work....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You're not a pain in the ass....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Will you let me finish.  I've been working on this all day.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: It's not easy.  None of it is.  I have to find some way to get on with my life and I'm going to try.  I finally figured that out.  I'm going to do my best....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Good.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: That's it?  Good...I thought you'd break out the champagne....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm pleased.  I really am.  Really....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: No more sharks.  I'll stay for another week, then....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: You just got here....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Children are never satisfied.  I have my house, my friends, my job...My life, Michael.  I have to live it. Besides, I'll be back.  Now show your mother what a good dancer you are.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: It's late....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Trying to write our report....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You look tired....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm fine....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You and Sean used to make....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I have to get this finished.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm leaving in a few days.  I don't want to do that with you unhappy....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I m not unhappy.  Frustrated maybe... Discouraged a little.  It'll work out....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm worried.. We haven't had our....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: There's nothing to worry about....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm your mother.  It's my job....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You looked just like your father... The first time the shark came to Amity....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I don't want to talk about that.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: It's a terrible thing to know some- thing no one else wants to believe.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm tired of hearing about it. There's no shark.  Sean wasn't killed by the same shark.. Dad didn't die because of it...It's all wrong... Some fantasy you've concocted...You keep bringing it up.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You hungry?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: No.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: It got him....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Why'd you come out here?

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Why'd you take the boat?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I want you all to come to Amity this summer.

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: There's a lot...I want to talk about it....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: Promise me you'll be all right....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Promise me....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'll wear my rubbers...I'll be careful ...I'll be....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: We will...We'll have a lot of time together, Michael....

turns.speaker: MICHAEL
turns.text: I'm going to finish what Jake and I started.  I owe him that.  Hell, I owe him everything....  I'll get something important done for both of us....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: First time for everything is the best.  After that you know too much and it's never quite the same.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You must get bored easily.

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Can you just go off...?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I'm the captain of this majestic ship.  It goes where I take it....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Flies the plane....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Mostly it feels like driving.  You digging for buried treasure?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I don't know why I've told you all this.  I hardly know you.

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Sometimes talking to a stranger is easier....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I...I can't explain it.  It's just something I feel.

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I always listen to my feelings....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Sometimes I think I'm going crazy. The nightmares....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: It could have been an accident....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: It was no accident....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: I'm not saying you're wrong, just that there are other possibilities....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: When it killed Sean it was like a stab in the heart.  I knew with absolute certainty that it had come for him. I knew that.  I know it's coming....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Depends on where you want to go....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Doesn't matter....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: How can you just take the plane like this?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Boss' day off...Take the wheel....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I can't....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Sure you can....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I don't know how....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: No one does till they learn....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: What are you doing?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: If you don't take it, we'll be swimming in a minute.

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: It's just like driving a car....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Where do I pull off...?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: You're doing fine.  I'll keep you out of trouble.  Relax....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm only doing this to get out of my family's hair....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: One time I was flying supplies up the Amazon.  Went down in the jungle....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You're not going to tell me, are you?

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Got picked up by a tribe of head- hunters....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You're impossible....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: They took me to the chief, who took a long look at me, then took me in his hut....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: The plane's turning....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: How do you like flying?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: It's wonderful....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: What's wrong?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: Nothing....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm fine.

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: No, you're not....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: I'm terrific... Come on....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You promised me a drink....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Sharks come and go, Ellen.  People don't have anything to do with it....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: The kind with an umbrella in it....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Give it up... Kick it in the ass... Get on with your life....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: A drink with an umbrella in it....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: A big one....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: A big one....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Couple of more passes and I'll buy my own airplane.. Hell, maybe my own airline....

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You're not going to bet it all....

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: All or nothing.  You want to roll them for me?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: No!

turns.speaker: HOAGIE
turns.text: Would you suffer through a dance with me?

turns.speaker: ELLEN
turns.text: You'll be sorry.
